page.title: 03THE HIGH WYCOMBE CREST HOTEL
page.content: TOURISM IS IMPORTANT TO{HIGH WYCOMBE.} 40,000 PEOPLE VISITED THE{HIGH WYCOMBE CREST HOTEL LAST YEAR.MOST OF THEM WERE BUSINESS-MEN AND SOME TOURISTS FROM{IRELAND,BELGIUM,GERMANY,HOLLAND, {DENMARK,FRANCE,ITALY,.U.S.A. AND {AUSTRALIA.}ON AVERAGE THE VISITORS STAY FOR 2 NIGHTS.MANY CHILDREN VISIT THE{HIGH WYCOMBE}CREST ESPECIALLY AT WEEKENDS.THE LOCAL PEOPLE OF{HIGH {WYCOMBE}VISIT THE HOTEL FOR A DRINK OR TO HAVE A MEAL,BUT THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE STAY. MANY BUSINESS CONFERENCES AND EXHIBITIONS ARE HELD AT THE{HIGH {WYCOMBE CREST HOTEL.} MANY FAMOUS PERSONALITIES FRON THE WORLD OF{ENTERTAINMENT}HAVE STAYED AT THE{HIGH WYCOMBE CREST HOTEL}INCLUDING POP STARS,SPORTSMEN AND THEATRICAL PERSONALITIES.{THE ENGLAND FOOTBALL {TEAM}HAVE STAYED THERE 12 TIMES.
